body:

comment_data.body: What command(s) did you execute to get this output? https://travis-ci.org/TokTok/js-toxcore-c/builds/348062416 shows that it can be installed.

Try this before you build:
```
$ npm install https://github.com/node-ffi/node-ffi
```

rename.to: Add install instructions to build node-ffi before js-toxcore-c.

title: Add install instructions to build node-ffi before js-toxcore-c.
